sentence: Our room was always cleaned before we got back from lunch and all amenities were replaced regularly

On arrival to our rooms we was a little disappointed Palm tree court is made up of blokes of apartment rooms the rooms we were taken to were at the far end of the complex meaning a very long walk back to the main reception area where morning breakfast is served and evening meals
We stayed for a few nights on all inclusive basis in a sea view room and I must say it is probably one of the best all inclusive hotels I have stayed in
well run buffet restaurantnoisy air con unit duvet too hot no alternative offered difficulty in booking tables at restaurants
UK Travellers the room has some standard uk plugs so no adaptors needed
The air conditioning in our room did not seem to stay at a cool temperature so it was quite warm at night time
The food was okay nothing amazing about it and not all the restaurants were part of the all inclusive package which I did n’t know until I reached my room and read their “ Welcome Letter ”
The only bar to visit after this time was located on the 7th floor near the rooms but became too overcrowded as everyone from the Sports Bar went into there at 1pm
At check in we were offered a sea view room but we stuck to our garden view because we saw the other reviews about this costing more
I came out of the bathroom to put on my clothes but it seems like he is trying to open the door through the sound of the door knob
He cleaned to a very high standard and kept us well supplied and replenished twice a day with bathroom toiletries tea and coffee milk bottled water etc
We had a 3 yr old travelling with us and he used the creche on a couple of mornings and loved it and also attended the mini disco on Friday nights 730pm to 830pm
There are good spirits bottled beers and wines etc although if you want the high end stuff it is clear with prices to pay
Our room was newly decorated with a stylish bathroom despite it being an older hotel
There was a lovely bar are the top of the hotel with amazing views but unfortunately under 21s were not allowed in
I was surprised how big the guest rooms were
Every time we came back to our room it was like new and care had been taken with our belongings
Gretz room 49 and thanks for everything

We enjoyed the mini golf experience and we had also suggest that maybe more children oriented activities and facilities would make the guests experience even better as we noticed that there are plenty of guests travelling here with their children I might suggest a water play area for children as well as a dry outdoor play area with a variety of choices for the little ones to enjoy have fun and exhaust their energy would be a great addition
Band playing most nights on the 7th floor gets very busy but open until 2 am there is a lady playing the piano most nights near the dining room she is excellent and always looks lovely too

We did a Stopover for 2 days at this Resort it had been recommended Excellent all round food amazing Beautiful Quiet Beach Location away from the city Staff polite and really helpful we had a beach sea view room

Stayed at this hotel with my family and got ta to say hotel was fantastic could not fault it each of the resorts restaurants food was brilliant the staff on our floor the peacock floor I believe were polite and friendly and could not be more grateful to them location was good maybe 25mins outside the city itself with a great view of the jebel ali palm and only ten minutes from the dubai parks nd resort would definitely return in the future also a special thnks to our housekeeping nilan I think for keeping our room tidy
It is easy to mistake these rooms are from another hotel once inside
Room pool and beach
Com guests differently regarding room location
On the whole our stay was quite enjoyable we were on the ultra all inclusive package had a free partial upgrade to 2 rooms of 3 and enjoyed excellent evening dining at the various restaurants
Extra bed given at free of cost and the in room service was very godStaf Service was amazing
The food is fantastic the rooms are good and well serviced
Surrounded by peacockswe loved the white one if you are lucky you will see it in palm tree court room areas
The food and restaurants were homely a bit dated as were the rooms but the family friendly appeal is unparalleled
